Joao Luiz Rebelo Moreira

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/3321809257390602
  • Última atualização do currículo em 23/11/2018

Tenho ampla experiência na indústria de TI desde 2001, atuando como programador, analista de sistemas e arquiteto de soluções; e na academia como pesquisador desde 2008. Eu sou capaz de trabalhar como especialista técnico e gerente de projetos, bem como engenheiro de vendas para a indústria e academia. Estou acostumado a projetos de vários tamanhos e duração. Sou proativo e capaz de exercer liderança no trabalho em equipe. Meu background é engenharia de software, cobrindo todo o gerenciamento do ciclo de vida de aplicativos, com ênfase na interoperabilidade de soluções de TI para integração e análise automatizadas de dados. Minha pesquisa é focada na interoperabilidade semântica de sistemas distribuídos para integração de dados. Meu doutorado foi realizado na Universidade de Twente, em pesquisa sobre integração de serviços de emergência apoiada pela Internet-das-Coisas (IoT). Possuo mestrado em informática e bacharelado em ciência da computação pela Universidade Federal do Rio de Janeiro (UFRJ). Meus estudos incluem engenharia de ontologia, modelagem conceitual baseada em ontologia, arquitetura orientada a serviços 2.0 (micro-serviços RESTful com computação em nuvem), engenharia orientada à modelos, sistemas distribuídos baseados em regras, processamento de eventos complexos e aprendizado de máquina. (Texto informado pelo autor)

Operador Nacional do Sistema Elétrico, ONS, Brasil.
Vínculo institucional

2010 - Atual
Vínculo: Celetista formal, Enquadramento Funcional: IT Analyst, Carga horária: 40, Regime: Dedicação exclusiva.
Outras informações
ONS is responsible for controlling the Brazilian power system. João works in the projects team of the IT department interfacing with the innovations and software architecture teams. Currently has been promoted to work as software architect for IT projects, often analytical solutions. One of its duties is to research technologies and methodologies for ONS projects, such as NOSQL databases, distributed processing by mapreduce, big data and cloud computing. He used to work as BI Analyst and he was responsible for managing software suppliers on maintenances of analysis information systems. Moreover he set standards, built POCs and implanted software development methodology. He started working as a System Analyst, programming and managing maintenances over the main electrical domain information system. He worked on the development of the electric historical sensors data extraction through implementation of ETL techniques. He worked on the implementation and deployment of ONS oriented-processes portal. He participated in the conception of the new electrical entities management system, integrating business processes over Service-Oriented Architecture, using ESB and EAI concepts. He worked in DevOps team, integrating business, systems and infrastructure analyst teams. He was one of the main responsible for the implantation of the Application Lifecycle Management procedures, designing and implementing the development methodology based on RUP. He worked also setting standards for source code control, continuous integration, automated deployment and processes standardization. He participated in the creation of standards and guidelines for building ETLs and other BI artifacts, .NET programming, services and database. He promoted (and taught some) training programs, as ETL, OO, development methodologies, among other themes.

Choice Technologies http://www.choice.com.br Choice is a BI consulting firm focused on the electricity market, providing solutions in the areas of fundraising, marketing and loss of energy. He started working as a programmer in the estimation and prediction of electricity prices software. He also made part of requirements elicitation and software architecture defining design patterns. He participated in the definition of test methodologies, versioning, deployment and software maintenance standards. He started working professionally with BI on ETL construction, cube building and results visualization through OLAP tool.

Its main product website used to integrate and add functionalities to social medias such as Orkut, MySpace and YouTube. Responsible for implementing programs using the Facebook development platform for indication of best friends, weather forecasting gadgets, among others.
